QuestData.Title: The Lorewalker on the Lake
QuestData.Description: Your raft is down in the water below. Take it out to the middle of the lake, where you should find a woman. Her name is Ana Wu.$b$bWhenever I have a question that I can't figure out on my own, I'll ask her. She should be able to tell us why these crocolisks won't stop attacking.
QuestData.LogDescription: Board your raft, then report to Wise Ana Wu in the middle of Nayeli Lagoon.
QuestData.RewardText: You appear troubled, child.$b$bHow can this Lorewalker serve you? What is it that you seek?
